value.title: <h1 . . . h6>
value.description: Used as table of contents by browsers and screen readers.

value.title: <article>
value.description: Can represent a Post, Comment, Blog, News Article, Widget, and (stuff I don't know yet. Needs update here).

value.title: <aside>
value.description: Represents a side note on the main -- (not to be confused with <main> element) -- content of a Sectioning. I guess that also includes an aside.

value.html:
Salamanders are a group of amphibians.

The Rough-skinned Newt defends itself with a deadly neurotoxin.

Several species of salamander inhabit the temperate rainforest of the Pacific Northwest, including the Ensatina, the Northwestern...

value.title: <nav>
value.description:
Represents navigations like Menus, Table of Contents, Indexes, Breadcrumbs, Navigation Paragraph, and etc...
Doesn't have to be a list, it can be paragraph with links.

value.html:
1. Bikes
  2. BMX
  3. Jump Bike 3000

Jump Bike 3000

This BMX bike is a solid step into the pro world. It looks as legit as it rides and is built to polish your skills.

value.title: <section>
value.description:
If none of the above is appropriate for the content you need to Section.
You can get away with not putting a Heading in here in some cases. Especially as an app component.

value.html:
Choosing an Apple

Introduction

This document provides a guide to help with the important task of choosing the correct Apple.

Criteria

There are many different criteria to be considered when choosing an Apple — size, color, firmness, sweetness, tartness...

value.title: <main>
value.description: Only 1 per document. Because this is what devices show when users want the "main" content.

value.html:
Gecko facts

Geckos are a group of usually small, usually nocturnal lizards. They are found on every continent except Australia.

Many species of gecko have adhesive toe pads which enable them to climb walls and even windows.

Cute Puppies Express!

I love beagles so much! Like, really, a lot. They’re adorable and their ears are so, so snuggly soft!

value.title: <footer>
value.description:
Footer of a "sectioning content"
[ Author ][ Copyright ][ Link to related documents ][ address element ][ time element ]

value.title: <strong>
value.description: Strong — seriously important. Can contain itself.

value.title: <mark>
value.description: Mark or Highlight — relevance in enclosing context for the user. In <q>/<blockquote>, it is relevant to user but not for the source. *

value.html: letting yourself lose is a bad habit.

value.title: <s>
value.description: No Longer Accurate — something that is no longer accurate. *

value.title: <u>
value.description: Unarticulated Annotation — Wrong spellings, Non-textual Annotations.
